headline: Is There Now an Opportunity in Dow After 6% Weekly Surge?
summary: If you've been following Dow's stock lately, you're likely weighing your options and wondering what the future might hold. With a recent 6.0% pop just this past week, it’s easy to wonder if some fresh optimism is surfacing. But if you zoom out, Dow’s track record over the past year tells a very different story, with the stock down nearly 56%, and long-term declines continuing to stack up, returning negative 41% over the last five years. So, what’s driving this tug-of-war? Investors are...
